name: MaPS S1E1
description:
When a mysterious disappearence and strange electromagnetic phenomena upset a small town, a detective from special paranormal unit MaPS starts working on the case.
  • Short, linear, 5k words story that you can finish in one session
  • Decide the duration of your experience: you can examine everything and talk to everyone or you could just click the YELLOW choices in the menus and experience a shorter, more straightforward story
  • Unlockable CODEX/Commentary files after finishing the story!
  • Cute animals characters portraits by Daizo
  • Original music by me! OST will be available soon on bandcamp

My first entry ever for NaNoRenO! This is a small game inspired by retro detective adventure visual novels. It's a mystery story in which you can examine things and talk to people. Unfortunately the case remains unsolved due to time constraints but maybe you can imagine a solution with the few clues hidden in this first part. Maybe I'll continue it someday or maybe not, think of it as a pilot episode for a new  tv show: who knows if it will be finished!
